title: Solo Que preferences
body:
I'm sure we have all at one point not been able to play a roll we want but what if a feature was implemented that allowed you the majoity of the time  to get the roll you wish  it would work like this

Pick your  preference
1Jungle
2top
3mid
4sup
5adc

Then the game will try and match you into a team so you can play as a roll you enjoy

so If one was taken then you would get to play as your second preference and so on.

replies.body: My guess as to why they don't add this is because it would mess with elo as there wouldnt be enough supports etc

It'd make more sense, seeing as you would que for the role with your highest potential, It can pretty much ruin a game if someone in a higher ELO has no experience and is forced into a particular role, since they will almost always lose lane / not provide proper jungle support. But I'm assuming there would be a reason for not having it if it hasn't been implemented yet.
I never thought of it like that thank you for your insight
That does sound a lot like Teambuilder, but for ranked. There must be a reason that Riot released it for normals and not for Ranked. Interesting theory though :D

Team builder sucks as you get into a team and you cant change your champion, why not have it you select the role, then get matched in a team where you can DISCUSS your choices. I hate when i go in and see we have an ad assassin top, mid and jungle and a squishy support. Great game that is gonna be
if you only play say, draven adc, and you put adc first and get it, what if draven is banned? {{champion:119}}
